name: Shoot on Sight
storyline:
Decades of rule by the rich have left the world on the brink of collapse. With oppression and corruption running rampant, the people have finally had enough. The Stagers lead the revolution to bring The System down and will stop at nothing to bring justice to this world, facing the most elite agents mustered by the wealthy to defend their ill-gotten gains. Who will you fight for?

Shoot on Sight is a near-future isometric tactical shooter for competitive PVP, cooperative PVE, and solo play, where good tactics matter far more than a big gun. Fight for the future of society on dynamic maps, outsmart your opponents, and remember: Shoot on sight!
summary: The System built a world of injustice and oppression. Pressed up against the wall, it now fights for its survival. Uphold the law as an elite police officer or join the Stagers to liberate the world, defining the future of society in this multiplayer isometric tactical shooter!
